title: (x) Concerta logo sans caps - Basic Commercial {Andrew J Sipe}
content:
hey. i need to find out the font for this logo if possible. the closest match i had was Neuzeit..

any help would be appreciated.

thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012151746/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_4.png) | 10.02 KB |

 [‹ (x) Geometric sans caps on 'Colour After Klein' book cover - (similar to) Prisma {Mike Y}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012151746/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39606 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Looking for ITC Avant Garde Gothic w/ alternate characters {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012151746/http:/www.typophile.com/node/18213 "Go to next forum topic")
author: misslaloki

comments.content:
I think you’re right with [Neuzeit-S Book](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012151746/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/neuzeit_s_lt_std_book_ot/) (with added styling effects).

- Mike Yanega

Actually I think it might be Basic Commercial : [http://www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Basic+Commercial](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012151746/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Basic+Commercial "http://www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Basic+Commercial")  
Of course with extra styling effects as Mike suggested.
